overview:
Arkuda Digital is a high-end software company, a global provider of UPnP/DLNA®, Embedded Technology, Cloud Computing and Content Security solutions to the Consumer Electronics ODM/OEMs, Cable and Telecom Operators, IPTV and Cloud Computing solution providers, and end consumers.

Creates innovative technology solutions aiming to help everyone experience the world in a more connected way. Standardized software enables seamless connectivity between UPnP/DLNA®-compliant devices in a digital network, allowing easy access, storing, protecting and managing multimedia content on digital electronic devices from different manufacturers.

Arkuda Digital was founded by a group of professionals with a broad expertise in a Digital Technology Industry. Value team averages 10+ years of experience in serving Fortune 500, mid-size and small companies worldwide. Company’s headquarters are located in New York, USA; the R&D center is based in Kiev, Ukraine, Eastern Europe. As the gateway to the EU, Ukraine has an access to the best technologies in the IT industry and is well known for its offshore development background.

Arkuda Digital creates seamless workflow integration with it’s partners; as a result they don’t need to make any significant changes in the existing processes. It allows to exchange knowledge and expertise in a natural way, without additional efforts, and to act as a part of partner’s team.
